lyrics:
2 contributorstranslations日本語松原みき miki matsubara  ai wa energy love is energy romanized lyrics松原みき「愛はエネルギ」 羅馬拼音歌詞

verse 1
iikiru yasashisa oboe teta mitai ne
monogatari no pororougu ja mayotte itanoni
yume wo nuri kaeta kisetsu no itazura
sonna koto mo yokatta no ne anata ni totte wa

chorus
you can dance dancing in my heart
karoyakana yume mitsuketa no
you can dance dance dancing in my heart
suberi hajimeru yasashisa de higher higher
ai wa energy ai wa energy

instrumental break

verse 2
machikado wa itsumo attakai hitomi
kanashikattari suru toki no soudan aite yo
kare kaketa hana ni ame ga furisosogi
atarashii kao de aisatsu asufarutogoshi ni

chorus
i can dance dancing in your heart
onaji aozora mitsuketa no
i can dance dance dancing in your heart
suberi hajimeru yasashisa de higher higher
ai wa energy ai wa energy
you might also likebridge
watashi kidzuita no konnani chikaku ni itako to
sou yo shiawase wo hakobu sutekina anata
bakkuboon

chorus
you can dance dancing in my heart
karoyakana yume mitsuketa no
i can dance dance dancing in your heart
onaji aozora mitsuketa no

outro
you can dance dancing in my heart
karoyakana yume mitsuketa no
i can dance dance dancing in your heart
onaji aozora mitsuketa no1embed
